DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__UIViews__c WHERE JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'Customer360'];
JBCXM__UIViews__c UIView  = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(Name = 'Customer 360' ,
                                                    JBCXM__VisualType__c = 'List',
                                                    JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'Customer360',
                                                    JBCXM__Visibility__c = 'Public',
                                                    JBCXM__ShowDefault__c = true,
                                                    JBCXM__IsShown__c   = true,
                                                    JBCXM__ColumnList__c = '[{"name":"Name","label":"Account Name","displayOrder":1,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Currency__c","label":"C_Currency","displayOrder":2,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"CURRENCY","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Phone__c","label":"C_Phone","displayOrder":3,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"PHONE","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Number__c","label":"C_Number","displayOrder":4,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"DOUBLE","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Percent__c","label":"C_Percent","displayOrder":5,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"PERCENT","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Picklist__c","label":"C_Picklist","displayOrder":6,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"PICKLIST","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Text__c","label":"C_Text","displayOrder":7,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_Checkbox__c","label":"C_Checkbox","displayOrder":8,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"BOOLEAN","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"C_URL__c","label":"C_URL","displayOrder":9,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"URL","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false},{"name":"NumberOfEmployees","label":"Employees","displayOrder":10,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Account","fieldType":"INTEGER","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false}]');
insert UIView;
